name: John Smith
description: John is a passionate chef who loves to experiment with different ingredients and cooking techniques. His dishes are always surprising and delightful.

recipes.name: Penne alla Vodka
ingredients: Salt and black pepper, to taste
method: Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente.
Meanwhile, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce thickens.
Season with salt and black pepper, to taste.
Drain the pasta and add it to the sauce.
Toss to coat the pasta in the sauce.
Serve hot with additional Parmesan cheese, if desired.
